c6e0fbf2-5ee3-4a70-a3f6-bb55f3dc8783.description: Completing Tranzfuser and developing a functioning prototype to take to market. As a Tranzfuser team you have delivered on key milestones outlined in your application by combining skills and resources to create a playable prototype with a feasible plan to take to market.
c6e0fbf2-5ee3-4a70-a3f6-bb55f3dc8783.name: Prototype

badge_template_activities.title: Provide monthly documentation to demonstrate key levels / milestones of development implemented during the Tranzfuser programme.
Present prototype at showcase event.
Attended the Games Biz Academy and completed the Enterprise Builders

badc22b5-da54-477b-8559-042624562cb3.description: Awarded to the artist who demonstrated artistic talent and contribution for the duration of Tranzfuser.
badc22b5-da54-477b-8559-042624562cb3.name: Artist

badge_template_activities.title: Will have contributed towards the art style and genre of their teams prototype.  Can include: •  2D / 3D art •  character art •  environmental art •  concept art •  technical art •  illustration •  animation

cf25e863-b8b1-48c4-a933-4d699a4f2b35.description: Four days showcasing to the general public, meeting target audience and networking with industry experts. Must be present at the Tranzfuser showcase at the national video game exhibition. Team members will have prepared for showcasing their prototype, attended, collected feedback and demonstrated positive leads to follow up and acted on feedback.
cf25e863-b8b1-48c4-a933-4d699a4f2b35.name: Showcase

badge_template_activities.title: Attendance and participation at the national showcase event

32dc41f1-b8b0-47cd-8b04-aef13d774975.description: #RTM: Read The Manual rewards applicants who have successfully submitted an application to Tranzfuser, demonstrating they have understood and met the criteria and successfully communicated their idea so that it stands out from the rest of the applications. It also acknowledges participants who have submitted Monthly Progress Update reports and engaged with our Games Biz Academy during the course of the programme.
32dc41f1-b8b0-47cd-8b04-aef13d774975.name: #RTM Read The Manual

badge_template_activities.title: Completed and submitted the Tranzfuser application form.
Upload the pitch video that your team created and submitted with your application.
Submitted Monthly Progress reports updating Tranzfuser of team progress with their prototype (includes written and video submission) during the course of Tranzfuser.
Attended the Games Biz Academy.

549cb2cd-0f18-4263-be3b-6cb63790922d.description: In 2020, the Tranzfuser showcase moved online in the form of ProtoPlay. ProtoPlay is a weeklong event in which the Tranzfuser teams’ journey and game development was presented digitally. ProtoPlay involved the teams providing game development content to enable their team film to be produced, to populate the ProtoPlay website, to showcase their game play on a live stream event on Twitch and to attend the Games Jobs Live: Tranzfuser Edition event.
549cb2cd-0f18-4263-be3b-6cb63790922d.name: ProtoPlay: Tranzfuser 2020 Showcase

badge_template_activities.title: Participated as a team member on Tranzfuser 2020. Participated on ProtoPlay. ProtoPlay involved: 2-3 minute Team Film, team content on ProtoPlay website, participation on Games Jobs Live:  Tranzfuser Edition and live streaming game play during ProtoPlay Live.

f009ebbf-b7f2-4e19-b3d3-d61d08151921.description: Awarded to programmer who demonstrated flawless coding skills and approach to develop the prototype.
f009ebbf-b7f2-4e19-b3d3-d61d08151921.name: Programmer

badge_template_activities.title: Participate as a team member on Tranzfuser.

b528a4f8-c849-418e-8fa6-97fc85a2638a.description: Awarded to all team members who participated in Tranzfuser 2020. This year marks a special year in which Tranzfuser went virtual. Teams experienced virtual pitching, a virtual showcase and many worked as a dispersed team working with online tools to communicate with their team members and create their game. They took part in online facilitator sessions provided by Tranzfuser and worked remotely from their local hub.
b528a4f8-c849-418e-8fa6-97fc85a2638a.name: Tranzfuser 2020

badge_template_activities.title: Taking part as a team member on Tranzfuser 2020.  Team attending weekly virtual facilitator sessions, completing and submitting their Dispersed Team Learning Assignment, attending virtual pitch and showcase event and working remotely from their Local Hub.

skills.name: Ability To Work Under Pressure In A Diverse Team

291abea0-68c6-4953-8c71-159e0d7783e9.description: The individual who receives this badge will have demonstrated a clear vision for the game aesthetics and gameplay and ensured the vision is shared across all roles in the team. They will have a knowledge of game engine(s), art, audio and narrative and be able to incorporate systems, mechanics and levels to make the game concept a reality. They will have considered and engaged with ‘outside’ world perspective to ensure that the game delivers the vision.
291abea0-68c6-4953-8c71-159e0d7783e9.name: Game Designer

badge_template_activities.title: The Game Designer Badge is an individual award, given to the team member who has taken the lead role to the design approach on the game.

2078dcdf-b88f-435e-805d-026eae552d63.description: Awarded for pioneering leadership and ability demonstrated during the Tranzfuser.
2078dcdf-b88f-435e-805d-026eae552d63.name: Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Act as the recognised Team Leader on a Tranzfuser team.
Successfully meet all team deliverables requested by Tranzfuser and deliver working prototype at a showcase event.
Attended the Games Biz Academy and submitted the Enterprise Builders associated with the programme.

b9d118e0-4cb3-4b6a-b37c-e4d9d0c3e2e9.description: Individual award to Producer who demonstrated seamless production skills to coordinate all aspects of the project and complete the prototype.
b9d118e0-4cb3-4b6a-b37c-e4d9d0c3e2e9.name: Producer

badge_template_activities.title: Participate as a team member on Tranzfuser and demonstrate production skills
By coordinating and submitting your team’s monthly development plan and progress video
Attended the Games Biz Academy and contributed to the Enterprise Builders.

4a845743-d422-47d9-b768-064c3c21b871.description: Awarded to all team members who participated in the Enterprise Pathway 2021. Teams with an entrepreneurial focus experienced virtual pitching, a virtual showcase and many worked as a dispersed team working with online tools to communicate with their team members and create their game. They took part in the Games Biz Academy, online facilitator sessions provided by Tranzfuser contributors and worked remotely from their local hub.
4a845743-d422-47d9-b768-064c3c21b871.name: Enterprise Pathway 2021

badge_template_activities.title: Taking part as a team member on the Enterprise Pathway 2021. Teams attending weekly virtual facilitator sessions, completing and submitting Enterprise Builders, attending the Games Biz Academy, virtual pitch sessions and showcase event and working remotely from their Local Hub.

skills.name: Ability To Work Under Pressure In A Diverse Team

26f783f1-9c9e-49b9-a314-4875c148c9ef.description: In 2021, the Tranzfuser showcase continued its presence online in the form of ProtoPlay. ProtoPlay is a weeklong event in which the Tranzfuser Enterprise Pathway teams’ journey and game development was presented digitally. ProtoPlay involved the teams providing game development content to enable their team film to be produced, to populate the ProtoPlay website, to showcase their gameplay on a live stream event on Twitch.
26f783f1-9c9e-49b9-a314-4875c148c9ef.name: ProtoPlay 2021: Tranzfuser Showcase

badge_template_activities.title: Contributed as a core team member on the Enterprise Pathway 2021. Participated on ProtoPlay 2021. ProtoPlay involved: 2-3 minute Team Film, team content on ProtoPlay website and live streaming gameplay during ProtoPlay Live.

b295577e-f928-405f-984a-edcda2549af8.description: Awarded to the person who developed the audio for the prototype. Audio impacts the feel, environment and the player's enjoyment of a game. Creating the appropriate audio for the prototype is key to its success and players desire to return to play over and over again. Audio should reflect the genre of the game, stimulating emotions in the player such as urgency, fear, relaxation. Successful audio is easily recognisable and remembered long after the game has ended.
b295577e-f928-405f-984a-edcda2549af8.name: Audio

badge_template_activities.title: Awarded to the person who developed the audio for the prototype

54a608d0-7d36-4408-b986-9a406883b68d.description: Teams participate on a 6-week long game jam whilst enhancing their employability. Teams will spend the time allocated to solely focus on building their game, exploring their skills in the context of a set theme, working together and creating a playable prototype to showcase to potential employers.
54a608d0-7d36-4408-b986-9a406883b68d.name: Employment Pathway

badge_template_activities.title: Individuals develop their skills suite in video game development
Individuals experience what it takes to work as a team
Teams create a playable prototype and professional itch.io page to enable them to have an online portfolio piece they can show to prospective employers

cc68653d-2494-448f-ad28-431d639da95e.description: Jamfuser is a game jam that feeds into Tranzfuser (a UK wide talent development programme for graduates looking to break into the video games development industry). As a result of an individual participating on a Jamfuser team, meeting our criteria and successfully submitting their game on to the Jamfuser game jam page, they will be awarded with the Jamfuser Game Jammer open badge.
cc68653d-2494-448f-ad28-431d639da95e.name: Jamfuser - Game Jammer

badge_template_activities.title: •  Participate on Jamfuser as part of a team (submit Jamfuser Team registration form) •  Create team itch.io project page •  Create a game in 72hrs •  Submit game (which meets the Jamfuser criteria) to Jamfuser itch.io page •  Game reviewed by Jamfuser external judges

6d55e9d6-3259-4761-b8b0-34d3c0daa3b2.description: During the Employment Pathway teams participate on a 6-week long game jam to create a playable prototype that they can use as a portfolio piece to showcase their skills to potential employers. This award goes to the team whose game audio was considered the best by the Employment Pathway External Judges.
6d55e9d6-3259-4761-b8b0-34d3c0daa3b2.name: Employment Pathway Industry Vote: Best Audio

badge_template_activities.title: Create a video game prototype during a 6-week long game jam. Game selected for Best Audio by External Judges

e1dea438-21a8-4f62-86b3-f5fe46702ecc.description: During the Employment Pathway teams participate on a 6-week long game jam to create a playable prototype that they can use as a portfolio piece to showcase their skills to potential employers. This award goes to the team whose game was considered Overall Best Game by the Employment Pathway External Judges.
e1dea438-21a8-4f62-86b3-f5fe46702ecc.name: Employment Pathway Industry Vote: Overall Best Game

badge_template_activities.title: Create a video game prototype during a 6-week long game jam. Game selected for Overall Best Game by External Industry Judges

1ba38cd8-9c0d-4cef-a326-722806f5d7c5.description: During the Employment Pathway teams participate on a 6-week long game jam to create a playable prototype that can be used as a portfolio piece to showcase their skills to potential employers. This award goes to the team whose game audio was considered the best by the General Public.
1ba38cd8-9c0d-4cef-a326-722806f5d7c5.name: Employment Pathway Public Vote: Best Audio

badge_template_activities.title: Create a video game prototype during a 6-week long game jam. Game selected for Best Audio by the General Public.

c6891246-459c-4c0f-a561-e41359a34c68.description: During the Employment Pathway teams participate on a 6-week long game jam to create a playable prototype that they can use as a portfolio piece to showcase their skills to potential employers. This award goes to the team whose gameplay was considered the best by the General Public.
c6891246-459c-4c0f-a561-e41359a34c68.name: Employment Pathway Public Vote: Best Gameplay

badge_template_activities.title: Create a video game prototype during a 6-week long game jam. Game selected for Best Gameplay by the General Public

95a3bd59-95e3-4862-885c-fdb57616bc13.description: During the Employment Pathway teams participate on a 6-week long game jam to create a playable prototype that they can use as a portfolio piece to showcase their skills to potential employers. This award goes to the team whose game was considered the best Overall by the General Public.
95a3bd59-95e3-4862-885c-fdb57616bc13.name: Employment Pathway Public Vote: Overall Best Game

badge_template_activities.title: Create a video game prototype during a 6-week long game jam. Game selected Best Overall by the General Public

4837eef9-ed5e-485a-bdc5-a0ab7252bac2.description: During the Employment Pathway teams participate on a 6-week long game jam to create a playable prototype that they can use as a portfolio piece to showcase their skills to potential employers. This award goes to the team whose game design was considered the best by the Employment Pathway External Judges.
4837eef9-ed5e-485a-bdc5-a0ab7252bac2.name: Employment Pathway Industry Vote: Best Design

badge_template_activities.title: Create a video game prototype during a 6-week long game jam. Game selected for Best Design by External Industry Judges.

05a4f03d-a247-4e62-8412-5ee9ea5397aa.description: During the Employment Pathway teams participate on a 6-week long game jam to create a playable prototype that they can use as a portfolio piece to showcase their skills to potential employers. This award goes to the team whose game narrative was considered the best by the Employment Pathway External Judges.
05a4f03d-a247-4e62-8412-5ee9ea5397aa.name: Employment Pathway Industry Vote: Best Narrative

badge_template_activities.title: Create a video game prototype during a 6-week long game jam. Game selected for Best Narrative by External Industry Judges

5c706878-33af-45a5-99d2-851bae4d442a.description: During the Employment Pathway teams participate on a 6-week long game jam to create a playable prototype that they can use as a portfolio piece to showcase their skills to potential employers. This award goes to the team whose game demonstrate the best technical skill by the Employment Pathway External Judges.
5c706878-33af-45a5-99d2-851bae4d442a.name: Employment Pathway: Industry Vote Best Technical Skills

badge_template_activities.title: Create a video game prototype during a 6-week long game jam. Game selected for Best Technical Skills by External Industry Judges

b24dcd1d-9741-41e3-9b96-28e4f08abf1b.description: During the Employment Pathway teams participate on a 6-week long game jam to create a playable prototype that they can use as a portfolio piece to showcase their skills to potential employers. This award goes to the team whose game visual art was considered the best by the Employment Pathway External Judges.
b24dcd1d-9741-41e3-9b96-28e4f08abf1b.name: Employment Pathway Industry Vote: Best Visual Art

badge_template_activities.title: Create a video game prototype during a 6-week long game jam. Game selected for Best Visual Art by External Industry Judges

ffca7b32-8365-48ed-86e0-51f59c2816d4.description: During the Employment Pathway teams participate on a 6-week long game jam to create a playable prototype that they can use as a portfolio piece to showcase their skills to potential employers. This award goes to the team whose game visuals were considered the best by the General Public
ffca7b32-8365-48ed-86e0-51f59c2816d4.name: Employment Pathway Public Vote: Best Visual Art

badge_template_activities.title: Create a video game prototype during a 6-week long game jam. Game selected for Best Visual Art by General Public
